cgcloud__BO_API_Transaction_Log__c.name: cgcloud__BO_API_Transaction_Log__c
cgcloud__BO_API_Transaction_Log__c.description: This object stores information about Business Object API Transaction Log, which is a collection of one or more promotions that should be created or updated under the same name via the Promotion BO Creation API.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Calculation_End_Time__c.description: Timestamp when off-platform signaled that the calculation was finished (the same timestamp for all promotions of the transaction).

cgcloud__Calculation_Schedule_Time__c.description: Timestamp when the promotion calculation was scheduled.

cgcloud__Error_Type__c.description: Shows the error type or phase when an error occurred.

cgcloud__Input_Json__c.description: Input .json file that's to be transformed to the promo .json file.

cgcloud__Number_of_Retries__c.description: Stores the number of retries that the system took to properly run the writing of a promotion.

cgcloud__Output_Json__c.description: Promo .json file that's to be passed to writeBoPromotion.

cgcloud__Promotion__c.description: SFID of the promotion that was either created or updated. The value of this field is set when the promotion is created.

cgcloud__Status__c.description: Indicates the status of the process.

cgcloud__Transaction_Id__c.description: Represents one transaction. For mass-copy or mass-edit, the integration multiple Business Object API Transaction Logs can be executed under the same transaction.

cgcloud__Workflow__c.description: Explains the various workflows that can be run via the process.

cgcloud__Write_End_Time__c.description: Timestamp when the promotion save process was completed.

cgcloud__Write_Start_Time__c.description: Timestamp when the promotion save process was started.
